resources.string: It is quite nice, but if you live in strange weather conditions like San Francisco, CA, bring a coat or sweatshirt just in case.
If you consider yourself quite a healthy individual, a shirt will do, especially going on nice walks.
As for most cases, fog means cold. Therefore, a coat will be advisable to wear while going outside.
It is now cloudy. There may be rain or it can be sunny later. Battle both conditions by bringing a coat and an umbrella.
If you have somewhere important to be, or if you just want to have some fun in the rain, an umbrella will help you out.
Snow can be quite fun. Make sure to keep yourself warm by wearing mittens, a snow coat, good pants, and possibly snow shoes.
It is not advisable to go anywhere at this time.
An umbrella might help if the drizzle is heavy, otherwise a coat will do.
